hero.text1: Write and publish your professional resume online.
hero.text2: Use your online resume to attract employers. Track your performance.

features.title: What are the benefits of Uptowork’s online resume maker?

items.title: Cover Letter Builder
items.body: Write a cover letter using the same templates as your resume.

items.title: Track Your Resume
items.body: Find out if employers are reading and downloading your resumes.

items.title: It's Fast and Easy to Use
items.body: Our online resume builder will help you write a perfect resume in minutes.

items.title: 20 Best Resume Templates
items.body: Create a modern and professional resume and cover letter.

items.title: Follow Tips From Experts
items.body: Our experts' tips will show you how to write a resume.

items.title: Flexible Text Editor
items.body: You will have access to the best text editor available.

quotes.quote: I found an article about how to write a professional resume on Uptowork. Then I discovered the application. It's useful and simple to use. It's not a free resume builder, but I guess you can't have everything.
quotes.author: ~ Thomas Freeman

quotes.quote: Uptowork's CV builder is fast and easy to use. I loved the great resume templates, and I loved the fact that I can have my cover letter in the same design.
quotes.author: ~ Mark Horotsky

benefits.title: Why is Uptowork the best resume builder online?

items.title: Professional Resume Templates
items.body: Choose professional, elegant, creative, or modern resume templates. Uptowork's resume maker offers 20 templates in 400 colors. You can easily adapt the designs to any resume format you choose: functional, reverse-chronological, or combination.

items.title: Tips From Recruiters
items.body: You no longer have to worry about how to make a resume. Our resume generator will guide you through the process of writing each section, step-by-step. Resume writing tips will help you get more job offers.

items.title: Edit Your Resume As You Like
items.body: Choose font types, sizes, and spacing. You can bold, italicize, and underline your text. Want to add live URLs? We've got you covered. It's like creating your resume in Word, but we take care of the formatting, and give you access to the best resume templates.

items.title: Cover Letter and Resume Builder
items.body: Create your professional Cover Letter in just a few simple steps. Use the same template for your cover letter and resume. Convince hiring managers to set up an interview with you.

items.text: Create an individual URL for your online resume.
Employers can view and download your resume.
Track how many employers view and download your resume.
Edit, publish and download your resumes any time you want.

prices.title: Choose the plan that best fits you

items.quote: The documents from the Resume Creator are professional and allow candidates to stand out. The templates are clear and they help showcase the most important information.
items.author: Megan McBride

items.quote: Uptowork's resume creator made my documents look much better. I am very happy with the template that I found, because it helped me make a professional resume.
items.author: Ashley Price

items.quote: The online resume creator offers eye-catching templates, and the tips help you create an effective resume. I landed a number of internship interviews.
items.author: Angelica Roth

errors.invalidPassword: La contraseña debe contener al menos 8 caracteres, con al menos 1 numero y 1 letra.
errors.noAccount: No existe una cuenta asociada a este correo.
errors.accountSocialExist: Ya existe una cuenta asociada a este correo, intenta ingresando por Facebook o Google
errors.emailPassNoMatch: La contraseña y el usuario no coinciden, verifica tu clave e intentalo nuevamente.
errors.badResetCode: El código para restablecer la contraseña ya no es válido, vuelve a solicitar restablecer la contraseña.
